Reviews.Title: “Good Value/Great Staff”

Reviews.Content: noticed hotel won service awards awards deserved quiet clean hotel staff front desk shuttle drivers servers breakfast bar beyond smile complimentary shuttle bonus aware booking times grateful time service shuttle excellent value getting airportthe pool looked inviting unfortunately stay short didnt opportunity try timeand time

Reviews.Title: “Nice service does not overcome bed bugs.”
Reviews.Author: U G
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel week september bed bugs staff responsive moving 145am discovered pests sleep remainder night photos bugs emailed manager reply informed dead bed bug ziplock bag front desk idea taking care care am left try disinfect luggage ill probably throw suitcase brought pests home huge hassle responsive service front desk cant overcome bed bugs

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great hotel”

Reviews.Content: san diego conference stayed holiday inn hotel front desk service team friendly helpful stayed special rate due conference rate included breakfast breakfast buffet people coupon breakfast costs 999 coffee tea breakfast included king size nonsmoking clean microwave fridge coffee maker tv hair dryer bathroom clean hotel gym pool jacuzzi clean nice hotel offers free shuttle mall 15min car mall shops definitely worth visit con hotel location san diego downtown 2530 min car cab airport hotel spend 50 renting car hotel commercial plenty gas stations limited amount restaurants chinese restaurant besides hotel wasnt recommendable food greasy waitress listen requests hotel recommendable

Reviews.Content: looking comfortable beds local reasonable cost hotel wireless free staff freindly reviews complain free breakfast ten bucks hot excellent selection breakfast foods downside property water pressure shower little trickle stay twenty minutes
